name: Kingdom Heroes 2
description:
Kingdom Heroes 2 is a 3D Fantasy MMORPG renown for its focus on massive Siege Warfare; granting players access to catapults, battleships, massive ground armies, and more. Kingdom Heroes 2 also provides players with the ability to Administrate Cities, controlling which shops are available, player taxes, city defenses, among many other regulations. Players are encouraged to experience the true Three Kingdoms feeling.


  • Epic Kingdom-wide Combat: Participate and lead your armies through massive three-way faction wars with hundreds of other players and thousands of other soldiers at once.
  • Ship-Based PvP: Take to the seas and control your own fleet of warships against the enemy!
  • Siege Engines: Raze cities to the ground using the awesome power of ballistae, catapults, trebuchets and more!
  • Revolutionary Guild PvP: Cooperate as a guild to take down fortresses, cities and trade hubs in the name of your Guild; then raise them from the ground up in whatever way you wish, controlling the future economy of the world!
  • Resource Management: Control a city for long enough, and players can become administrators, collecting taxes on every transaction in that city as well as controlling which buildings, shops, and NPC's are added to the city.
  • Customizable Armies: Customize your armies with unique armor taken off the bodies of your foes to instill fear during combat.
